titleStmt.title: A true relation of Colonell Cromwels proceedings against the cavaliers wherein set forth the number of those that were taken, kil'd and maimed at his late victories obtained over them : sent in a letter / from a Gentleman in his army ; dated July 24, 1643, to a friend in London.
titleStmt.author: Gentleman in his army.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
